participant_1.background:
I am busy working with publishers but I make time for my family.
I am a little light for my age, but I am growing well.
i watch every football game at alabama.
I love to share my short films with my friends and get their feedback.
I joined a ski club and met a great group of friends.

participant_2.background:
I spend time tending to my flower beds to keep my mind clear and at peace.
i am an avid fan of the boston celtics.
i like to listen to rap music.
i am in grad school.
i love to bake.

content.text: Not much. Just got done baking a cake and working on my research paper.
Oh cool. What's the paper on?
It's on how to improve the customer experience in online retail.
Oh that sounds interesting. I'm not much of a baker, but I love to watch cooking shows.
Yeah, cooking shows are great. I like watching them too.
What's your favorite thing to bake?
I love making cakes. They're so easy and you can get really creative with them.
Yeah, I've always wanted to try making a cake from scratch.
It's not too hard, just takes some time.
Maybe I'll try it this weekend.
That would be fun! If you need any help, I'm always here.
Thanks! I'll keep that in mind.
No problem! So, what do you do for work?
I'm a publisher. I work with authors and help them get their books published.
Oh that sounds cool. I've always wanted to write a book.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
Maybe I will. Thanks for the encouragement.
